# Inleiding

```{r setup}
# Opties
library(knitr)
library(here)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)
opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here())

# Packages
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)  
library(xlsx)
library(mapview)
library(rgbif)

# Source
source(here("src", "R", "functions.R"))

# References
knitr::write_bib(c("tidyverse", "sf", "xlsx", "mapview", "rgbif"), 
                 file = "packages.bib")
```
